safetyTips: PPE supplied to staff and 2 metre working distance;.
name: BIGJIGS TOYS
address: Bigjigs Toys Ltd, Unit B, West Park Farm Ind. Estate, Kingsmead, Folkestone, Kent, CT19 5EU
description: Bigjigs Toys is a leading wooden toy manufacturer based in Folkestone. We hold child development and education at the heart of everything we do. We offer quality, safe and affordable products which are responsibly sourced and complement childhood development through fun, exploration and learning. Order online via website.
